column4: I use Places > Connect to server and do pretty much the same as joebodo suggested, except in there you can select "add bookmark" so you won't have to keep typing in the ip address
I don't have a windows machine to check on, but I *think* knowing the name of the folder makes life easier as on my gf's home network I couldn't just browse the network.
before, I was able to browse the folders under places->network
